title: U.S.-Mexico border holds tragic immigrant stories. A new L.A. exhibition lets them speak
dc:creator: Selene Rivera
description: A UCLA professor visited the desert to collect photos, abandoned items and other media for the exhibition, which he calls a testimony to the ongoing calamity at the border.
content:encoded: A UCLA professor visited the desert to collect photos, abandoned items and other media for the exhibition, which he calls a testimony to the ongoing calamity at the border.

media:content.media:description: Karen Crews Hendon, cuuradora de LA Plaza de Cultura y Artes se sienta a lado de algunos zapatos encontrados en la frontera. (Foto de James Carbone)
